testcase.name: TC_01_Test_Case
testcase.system-out: Given launch the browser02..................................................passed When navigate to the url02..................................................passed Then verify the homepage if it is visible successfully02....................passed Then click on signup or login button........................................passed And verify new user signup caution is visible...............................passed Then enter name and email address...........................................passed And click on the signup button..............................................passed Then verify the ENTER ACCOUNT INFORMATION is visible........................passed Then fill details title name email password dob.............................passed Then select the signup for our newsletter checkbox..........................passed Then select the receive special offers from our partners checkbox...........passed Then fill details firstname lastname company address address2 country state city zipcode mobile number.passed Then click create account button............................................passed Then verify that ACCOUNT CREATED is visible.................................passed Then click continue button..................................................passed Then verify Logged in as username is visible................................passed Then click Delete Account button............................................passed Then verify that ACCOUNT DELETED is visible and click Continue button.......passed Then close the browser......................................................passed
